posts.name: The Dog House
posts.note: No-frills, cash-only eatery with counter seating, offering hot dogs, burgers, pizza and cheesesteaks. Their foot long hot dags or two in a soft roll with some tooth and an order of French fires will fill you right up.

posts.name: Go Fish!
posts.note: Casual 40-seat restaurant with British theme featuring fish 'n' chips, toffee pudding and other eats. The dish to order is the fisn and chips (French fries) with a side order of curry sauce.
posts.cptn: Fish and chips (french fries for the Americans) with a side of curry sauce. Well worth the long drive home from Go Fish in Rehobooth Beach, DE

posts.name: Hopkins Farm Creamery
posts.note: Ice cream made with local ingredients and sold from walk-up windows on a working dairy farm. You should get their salted carmel crunch which has nuts and large chocolate chip hunks.
